text: Hamza Lahmar (born 28 May 1990) is a Tunisian international footballer who plays for Al-Kuwait as a midfielder. ==Career== Lahmar has played for Étoile du Sahel, ES Zarzis, ES Hammam-Sousse and Al-Kuwait. He made his international debut in 2015, and was named in the squad for the 2017 Africa Cup of Nations. ==International goals== :Scores and results list Tunisia's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%;" !
